alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greenville, north central Anderson and east central Pickens Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Easley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Easley, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Berea, Welcome, Powdersville, Cherrydale Point, Furman University and Travelers Rest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
